edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption

Interface CramerShoupDDHEnc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsymmetricEnc, Cca1, Cca2, Cpa, Eav, EncSecLevel, Indistinguishable, NonMalleable, SecurityLevel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CramerShoupAbs, ScCramerShoupDDHOnByteArray, ScCramerShoupDDHOnGroupElement

    public interface CramerShoupDDHEnc
extends AsymmetricEnc, Cca2
    General interface for CramerShoup encryption scheme. Every concrete implementation of CramerShoup encryption should implement this interface. By definition, this encryption scheme is CCA-secure and NonMalleable.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption.AsymmetricEnc
